info.description: API for gym slot booking system.
info.title: FitSlot API

get.summary: List time slots for a gym

post.description: Admin-only: create a time slot for a gym
Login with email and password to receive access/refresh tokens
Exchange a refresh token for a new access token
Register a new user (member role by default) and return access/refresh tokens
Cancel a booking owned by the current user

get.summary: List time slots for a gym

get.description: Exposes Prometheus metrics in text format

post.description: Create a booking for the current user (paid with wallet or subscription)
Purchase a subscription plan using wallet balance
